long_description: The MSR DeepDish(TM) bowls make a great addition to any outdoor kitchen, and they work well no matter what's on the menu, be it soup or pasta. Polypropylene is safe for use with hot and cold foods; 100% BPA free. Color-coding matches the MSR mugs and utensils (sold separately). MSR DeepDish bowls nest inside the Trail Lite Duo cook system and outside the Reactor(R) 1.7-liter pot (sold separately).
short_description: The MSR DeepDish(TM) bowls make a great addition to any outdoor kitchen, and they work well no matter what's on the menu, be it soup or pasta.
